component.name: SheepShaver
component.summary: Open source classic PowerPC Mac OS emulator

description.p: SheepShaver is a Mac OS run-time environment that allows you to run classic PowerPC and 68k Mac OS applications (1990s-2000s era). Prerequisites: PowerMac ROM image and a copy of MacOS.

ul.li: Runs MacOS 7.5.2 thru 9.0.4. MacOS X as a guest is not supported.
Access to floppy disks, CD-ROMs and HFS(+) partitions on hard disks
Easy file exchange with the host OS via a "Host Directory Tree" icon on the Mac desktop
Internet and LAN networking via Ethernet

description.p: Authorship: This build was compiled by https://github.com/Korkman/macemu-appimage-builder from https://github.com/kanjitalk755/macemu which is a fork of the official https://github.com/cebix/macemu.
